DOC.brief_summary: To access whether the ovulation triggering with rec-HCG instead urinary-HCG has any impact on the blastulation rate and pregnancy rate of patients undergoing IVF treatment
DOC.brief_title: Pregnancy Rates in IVF After Ovulation Triggering With Recombinant or Urinary Human Chorionic Gonadotrophin (HCG)
DOC.criteria: FSH<12, normal sperm,less than 36y, single blastocyst transfer endometriosis stage 3&4, pco
